participant_1.background:
My worst moment was when my salon was robbed.
my mother is an immigrant from saudi arabia.
I just finished building my new gaming computer.
i am married and have 2 kids.
my mom is a painter.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my daughter and mom!
I went for a walk today after work, even though I was tired
i got married 10 years later.

I like to eat the skin of the apple, but my family is not fond of it.

content.text: I am trying to build a new gaming computer. What was your favorite part of the process?
My favorite part was picking the parts, and then getting to put it all together. It was really fun to learn how to do it.
I was nervous about that part, but I think I can do it. I am worried I won't have enough room for everything.
I was worried about that too, but it turned out fine. I just had to make sure I got a case that was big enough.
What about your mom? Was she worried?
She was a little bit nervous, but she was also excited to see what I was doing. She helped me pick out some of the parts.
My mom is an artist, and she is really good. She paints pictures and she also teaches art classes.
That's really cool! I'm not very artistic, but I like to draw sometimes.
I wish I could draw. I am good at building things, but I am not so good at art.
We all have our strengths and weaknesses. I'm sure you are good at something that I'm not good at.
I am sure you are right. I am just glad that I have a mom that is supportive of my interests.
Me too! My mom is the best.
I know what you mean. It's nice to have a mom that is always there for you.
